description.value:
After you cast a spell that deals cold or fire damage, you gain the condition Cold Attuned or Fire Attuned respectively, which are detailed below:

  • Cold Attuned: When you cast a spell that deals cold damage, you and one target damaged by the spell before it ends suffer 1d4 cold damage. This condition ends after 1 minute or when you cast a spell that deals fire damage.
  • Fire Attuned: When you cast a spell that deals fire damage, you and one target damaged by the spell before it ends suffer 1d4 fire damage. This condition ends after 1 minute or when you cast a spell that deals cold damage.
